### Vasopressor Non-Response

Potential causes of haemodynamic resistance to vasopressors include:

* Preload
	* Occult bleeding
* Inotropy
	* Acidosis
	* Hypocalcaemia
	* Hypothyroidism
	* Toxins
		* Î²-blockade
		* Calcium channel blockers
		* Digoxin
	* Hypothermia
* Afterload
	* Anaphylaxis
	* Adrenal insufficiency
